p: District of Gampaha is the second most populated district with the third highest urban population in Sri Lanka with an estimated population of around 2.2 million. The district had an annual population growth rate of 1.02% in the year 2008. Depending on the presence of major cities and industrial sites the population density varies [ 8]. In 2004/2005, the area of paddy cultivated was 10,170 hectares in the district. Fifteen Medical Officer of Health (MOH) areas with 1,177 Grama Niladhari (GN) divisions and 1,784 villages are located in the district [ 9â€“ 11].
